title: Wagner Spraytech C900054 905e AutoRight Multi-Purpose Steam Cleaner, 12 Accessories Included, Power Steamer for cleaning, Color May Vary
description: Clean your vehicle's interior with the power of chemical-free steam. The Wagner 905e AutoRight steam cleaner uses nothing but distilled water to steam clean away dirt, grime and grease from vehicle upholstery, leather, carpets, wheels, windows, dashboards and more. The steam cleaner leaves behind no chemical residue, which is great for cars with kids, pets, or those with chemical sensitivities. The steamer is compact and portable with wheels that allow the steamer to follow you as you clean. It is also versatile and is able to help with other household cleaning projects such as wallpaper removal (attachment sold separately), cleaning countertops, sinks, bathrooms, tile grout and more. Includes: Wagner 905e AutoRight Steamer, Measuring Cup, Funnel, crevice tool, straight adaptor, jet nozzle, large and small rigid nylon brushes, large and small soft nylon brushes, microfiber cleaning towel, squeegee with base and a microfiber bonnet.
